thama aandu palana samaye jathyanthara balapam nothaka yuddhaya awasan kilada wathman rajaya 2015 janawari 09 wanada me rate balayata pathwu da patan wideshiya balawathunge uwamana epakam itukarana aanduwak bawata path wu bawatada wipaksha nayakawaraya chodana kaleya. 2015 di wathman aanduwa owunge wideshiya hamputhun samanga ekwi eksath jathinge manawa himikam kawunsilaya thula sammatha karagaththa30/1 yojanawen, shri lankawe yuda aparadha wimarshanaya karanna wideshiya winishchayakarawarun ha parichodakayange sahabhagithwayen demuhun yuda aparadha adhikaranayak pihituwanna ekangawu bawada ee mahatha pawasayi. 30/1 yojanawe sandahan porondu itu kirimata danatamath lanka aanduwa nithi gananawakma sammatha kara awasan bawath 2016 anka 14 darana athurudahan wuwange karyala panatha thulin, oonama awasthawaka thriwidha hamudawe ho polisiye parishrayakata athul wela ehi thibena bhanda ho liyawili thaman santhakayata ganna balaya thiyena, awashya pudgalayan kandawa rajya rahas panathe widhi widhanath bala rahitha wena widiyata sakshi wibhaga kala haki wimarshana sabhawak danatamath athi kara awasan bawath wipaksha nayakawaraya sandahan kaleya.
